author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses some bugs that have been observed recently:
* handle variable output shapes with batching
* avoid divide by zero in exception message
* handle zero-sized input in CPU shared memory

This PR also incorporates a few improvements:
* avoid constructing exception message strings for successful calls
  * the previous method was observed to make a non-negligible contribution to CPU usage in low-latency applications
* full type checking for inputs and outputs
* update README: fallback server options, timeout behavior

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run successfully. (Bug fixes have previously been tested individually with private branches that demonstrated the bugs.)
title: Miscellaneous fixes and improvements for SonicTriton
